Package edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.directory

Class StudentDirectory

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.directory.StudentDirectory
public class StudentDirectory extends Object
Maintains a directory of all students enrolled at NC State. All students have a unique id.
Author:
Sarah Heckman, Arnav Ganguly, Aaron Green, Peyton Herring

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    StudentDirectory()
    Creates an empty student directory.

  • Constructor Details

    • StudentDirectory

      public StudentDirectory()
      Creates an empty student directory.

  • Method Details

    • newStudentDirectory

      public void newStudentDirectory()
      Creates an empty student directory. All students in the previous list are list unless saved by the user.

    • loadStudentsFromFile

      public void loadStudentsFromFile(String fileName)
      Constructs the student directory by reading in student information from the given file. Throws an IllegalArgumentException if the file cannot be found.
      Parameters:
      fileName - file containing list of students
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if file cannot be read properly

    • addStudent

      public boolean addStudent(String firstName, String lastName, String id, String email, String password, String repeatPassword, int maxCredits)
      Adds a Student to the directory. Returns true if the student is added and false if the student is unable to be added because their id matches another student's id. This method also hashes the student's password for internal storage.
      Parameters:
      firstName - student's first name
      lastName - student's last name
      id - student's id
      email - student's email
      password - student's password
      repeatPassword - student's repeated password
      maxCredits - student's max credits.
      Returns:
      true if added
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if password is null, empty, or does not match the repeat

    • removeStudent

      public boolean removeStudent(String studentId)
      Removes the student with the given id from the list of students with the given id. Returns true if the student is removed and false if the student is not in the list.
      Parameters:
      studentId - student's id
      Returns:
      true if removed

    • getStudentDirectory

      public String[][] getStudentDirectory()
      Returns all students in the directory with a column for first name, last name, and id.
      Returns:
      String array containing students first name, last name, and id.

    • saveStudentDirectory

      public void saveStudentDirectory(String fileName)
      Saves all students in the directory to a file.
      Parameters:
      fileName - name of file to save students to.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if file can not be written

    • getStudentById

      public Student getStudentById(String id)
      Returns a Student object from sorted list studentDirectory if id matches
      Parameters:
      id - for student id
      Returns:
      Student object if id is equal, null if no student found
